name: Alien War (blacksad123)
description:
The player flies an UFO and attempts to defend itself from AI taking over their planet for space and resources. Points are scored for destroying enemies and collecting bonus items. Players are rewarded with bonus points, power ups depending on enemy destroyed or dodged.

Team : HotShots

1.GameDevelopers    :Giridharahn Punithavalli Balaji Kannan 

2.Art , Design                 : Anand Mohapatra

3.Art, Design                  : Sai Prashanth
